title: Zoning change SLU - Student Housing Project

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 37   INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN MARLENE DAVIS An Ordinance recommended by the Planning Commission on March 4, 2015, to change the zoning of property as indicated on the District Map, from "E" Multiple-Family Dwelling District, "H" Area Commercial District and "J" Industrial District to the "H" Area Commercial District only, in City Blocks 1959 (19-43 N. Grand Blvd and 2-44 & 24R N. Spring Ave.), 1960 (3604-94 Lindell Blvd., 3655-73 &3689 West Pine Mall, & 220 N. Spring Ave.) and 3928 (3701-17, 3721-27, 3731, 3737-39, 3741, 3747, 3751-53, 3757-59 & 3863 Laclede Ave.), so as to include the described parcels of land in City Blocks 1959, 1960 and 3928; and containing an emergency clause.
